meanings.definition: A device used in animation to trace over motion picture footage.
meanings.sent1: The rotoscopes helped the animators copy the movements accurately.
meanings.sent2: The studio invested in new rotoscopes for the upcoming animated film.
meanings.sent3: The rotoscopes decided to take a break and watch a movie instead.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes followed his every move as if she were a rotoscopes tracing his steps.
meanings.sent5: The rotoscopes hummed softly as it meticulously copied each frame.

meanings.definition: The process of creating animation by tracing over live-action film footage.
meanings.sent1: Using rotoscopes can make the animation look more realistic.
meanings.sent2: The animator spent hours perfecting the rotoscopes for the scene.
meanings.sent3: The rotoscopes giggled as they danced along with the actors on screen.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a rotoscopes, capturing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The rotoscopes brought the characters to life with their careful tracing.
